creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
It appears that the init function may be called twice if
a second request comes in while the servlet is still
executing the first init.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
For query purposes, mark as fixed for Tomcat 3.3:
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3

creator: nacho@apache.org
text: *** Bug 179 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
